mapper.select: SELECT APV_CATEGORY_NO as no , APV_CATEGORY_NAME as name FROM WORKUS_APPROVAL_CATEGORY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORKUS_APPROVAL_TEXT_AREA ( APV_TEXT_NAME , APV_TEXT_VALUE , APV_NO) VALUES ( #{termName} , #{termValue} , #{apvNo})
mapper.sql: SELECT a.apv_no as apv_no , a.apv_created_date as apv_created_date , a.apv_title as apv_title , a.apv_category_no as apv_category_no , c.apv_category_name as apv_category_name , a.user_no as user_no , a.apv_status as apv_status , a.apv_approver_no as apvUserNo FROM WORKUS_APPROVAL a JOIN WORKUS_APPROVAL_CATEGORY c ON c.APV_CATEGORY_NO = a.APV_CATEGORY_NO
mapper.select: WHERE a.user_no IN (SELECT U.USER_NO FROM WORKUS_USERS U JOIN WORKUS_DEPT D ON D.LEADER_NO = #{leaderNo} AND U.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO)

SELECT a.apv_no as apv_no , a.apv_text as apv_text , a.apv_to_date as apv_to_date , a.apv_from_date as apv_from_date , a.apv_created_date as apv_created_date , a.apv_title as apv_title , a.apv_category_no as apv_category_no , c.apv_category_name as apv_category_name , a.user_no as user_no , a.apv_reason as apv_reason , a.apv_status as apv_status , a.apv_approver_no as apv_approver_no , a.apv_rejection_reason as apv_rejection_reason , t.apv_text_no as apv_text_no , t.APV_TEXT_NAME as apv_text_name , t.APV_TEXT_VALUE as apv_text_value FROM WORKUS_APPROVAL a JOIN WORKUS_APPROVAL_CATEGORY c ON c.APV_CATEGORY_NO = a.APV_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN WORKUS_APPROVAL_TEXT_AREA t ON t.apv_no = a.apv_no WHERE a.apv_no = #{apvNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE WORKUS_APPROVAL SET APV_STATUS = 'completed' , APV_APPROVER_NO = #{reqDto.reqUserNo} WHERE APV_NO = #{reqDto.no}
UPDATE WORKUS_APPROVAL SET APV_STATUS = 'rejected' , APV_REJECTION_REASON = #{rejectDto.reason} WHERE APV_NO = #{rejectDto.no}
